description.name: Server Description
description.description: A brief description of the server

website.name: Server Website
website.description: A URL leading to the website for the server

icon.name: Server Icon
icon.description: A URL leading directly to an image for the server icon

showModpack.name: Modpack Field Visible
showModpack.description:
If the modpack field should be visible
_Should be true if the server requires the client to be modded to connect_

modpackName.name: Modpack Name
modpackName.description: The name of the modpack that the server is running

modpackVersion.name: Modpack Version
modpackVersion.description: The version of the modpack that the server is running

modpackURL.name: Modpack Website
modpackURL.description: A URL to the website for the modpack

showAddress.name: Server Connection Visible
showAddress.description:
If the server connection (ip & port) should be visible
_Only Java Edition servers are supported_

version.name: Server Version
version.description:
The minecraft version the server is running
_If this is left blank the version obtained by the ping results will be displayed_
_Only Java Edition servers are supported_

address.name: Server Address
address.description:
The ip address used to ping the server
_This cannot be left blank and the port must be excluded_
_Only Java Edition servers are supported_

port.name: Server Port
port.description:
The port used to ping the server
_If left blank the default port is used and will be hidden_
_Only Java Edition servers are supported_

showBedrockAddress.name: Bedrock Connection Visible
showBedrockAddress.description:
If the server connection for Bedrock should be visible
_This is only for Java Edition servers that can accept Bedrock clients_

bedrockVersion.name: Bedrock Version
bedrockVersion.description: The Bedrock version(s) of clients that the server will accept

bedrockAddress.name: Bedrock Address
bedrockAddress.description: The address used by Bedrock clients to connect

bedrockPort.name: Bedrock Port
bedrockPort.description: The port used by Bedrock client to connect

mapURL.name: Map Website
mapURL.description:
A URL to the web map for the server
_Leave blank if there is no web map or do not want it to be visible_
